summary: Feng shui is an ancient Chinese practice that aims to harmonize people with their environment using energy forces. It literally means "wind-water" and involves arranging spaces to let "Qi," or cosmic energy, flow smoothly. People use feng shui to decide where to build homes, buildings, and even tombs. While it's seen as a way to improve health and wealth in the West, many scientists consider it pseudoscience because its claims can't be proven using scientific methods.
title: Feng shui
